ValidationRule.description: Makes sure RPC's are populating a desired plan start date.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL( Product_Type__c , "Upgrade") && ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won") && (ISBLANK( Upgrade_Effective_Date__c ) = TRUE ) && CloseDate > DATE(2022,01,01)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please confirm the effective date of the plan upgrade
